paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the V30M mutation in the TTR gene associated with familial amyloid polyneuropathy (FAP).

functional_data.summary: The V30M mutation is well documented for familial amyloid polyneuropathy (FAP).

variants.segregation_data: The V30M mutation is known to segregate with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The V30M mutation is a well-known variant in the TTR gene associated with FAP.
key_quotes: We additionally tested the usability of this reporter system for two additional disease-related genomic loci: the V30M mutation of the TTR gene which is well documented for familial amyloid polyneuropathy (FAP).

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in the TTR gene was found in the text.
